GSD.description:
udmabuf: Set ubuf->sg = NULL if the creation of sg table fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 9861e43f097a50678041f973347b3a88f2da09cf. For more details please see the references link.
